page.title: 01QUARRINGTON AND DISTRICT
page.content: Our D Block is mostly farm land and consists of two villages,{Silk {Willoughby}and{Quarrington. }It also has a mental hospital{(Rauceby {Hospital). }In Silk Willoughby there is a burial mound left by the ancient Britons, and in the church there is a font left by the Normans. There used to be a school, but now it is a village hall. There are two main roads, London Road and Grantham Road, also there is a railway line from {Sleaford}to{Grantham}and a bus service from Sleaford to Grantham. In{Quarrington}there is a church and down the road there is a riding school. In{Silk Willoughby}there is a public house called the Horseshoes. Most of the farmers grow crops but some also have sheep. There are daily deliveries of{milk}and{mail}and weekly {garbage collection.
